Come share your talents in a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere. No judgments, just pure creative vibes and community energy. Everyone's welcome â€” grab the mic and make it yours!

heading: Rules
body:
Respect the Stage
One mic, one performer at a time. Give others your full attention while theyâ€™re up there.

Time Limit
Please keep your performance within 5 minutes to ensure everyone gets a chance.

Family-Friendly Content
No hate speech, slurs, or overly explicit content. Letâ€™s keep the space inclusive and welcoming.

Sign-Up First
Performers must sign up before taking the stage. Slots are first-come, first-served.

No Heckling
Be kind. No interrupting or mocking performers â€” weâ€™re all here to support each other.

Respect the Equipment
Treat the mic and gear with care. If you need help, ask the host.

Original or Covered â€” Just Credit It
You're welcome to perform original work or covers â€” just make sure to credit the original artist when needed.
